mapper.insert: insert into storeReview (num, storeNum, storeName, writer, content, star, targetNum, groupNum, orderNum, imagePath, regdate) values(#{num}, #{storeNum}, #{storeName}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{star}, #{targetNum}, #{groupNum}, #{orderNum}, #{imagePath}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from storeReview where storeNum=#{storeNum} order by groupNum desc, num asc
